short_summary: National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the provision of digital scanning services
description: Establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the provision of digital scanning services, indexing and delivery of electronic files for use in business and information management systems, related to such forms as paper, PDF, micrographic documents, audio-visual media, overhead transparencies, x-rays, etc.
duration_in_months: What would be the duration in months of the Contract?
full_summary:
## Tender Notice: Request for Standing Offer

### Description:
The Government of Canada is seeking a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the provision of digital scanning services, including indexing and delivery of electronic files for use in business and information management systems. This NMSO will provide the Government of Canada with a single access point to purchase these services from qualified suppliers.

### Requirements:
The required services include:

* Digital scanning of a variety of document types, including paper, PDF, micrographic documents, and more.
* Indexing and metadata creation for scanned documents.
* Delivery of electronic files for use in business and information management systems.

### Technical Criteria:
The evaluation and selection of a supplier will be based on a comprehensive assessment of their responsiveness to the solicitation, and upon evaluation of their technical merit and pricing. 

### Important Notice:
The closing time for bid submissions has been amended. Bids must be submitted by September 14th, 2023 at 2 p.m. EST. Any bid submitted after 2 p.m. EST will be declared non-responsive.

### Tender Details:

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3991178614
* **Publishing Date:** June 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 14, 2023 (14:00:00 ET)
* **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick, Manitoba, Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region), Northwest Territories, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, National Capital Region, Yukon, Newfoundland and Labrador, and British Columbia.
* **End-User Entity:** Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
    + Name: Annie Ouellette, contact@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    + Tel: n/a
* **Procurement Language:** English and French
* **Trade Agreement:** This procurement is subject to several trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and more.

### Notice URL:

* [Notice URL in English](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16653386?extsite=MTY2NTMzODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information:
For more information, please contact the tender contact above or visit the notice URL.  The list of documents requested for the tender can be found in the Ariba Discovery platform.
